title: A Waltz Through the Hills
overview: When Sammy Dean and her older brother Andy are suddenly orphaned, they fear that they will be separated and placed in foster homes. So they set off along on foot, hoping to reach a ship that will take them to England and their only surviving relatives. The two young runaways must make their dangerous journey through some of the worldâ€™s harshest terrain-the wilds of the Australian outback.
